>> That may not be what you meant, but that's what it sounded like.

>I can see your point but I think it would be a good way to promote
JUnit

along

I prefer to promote good use of JUnit to fewer people than worse use of
JUnit to more people. I'll stick out my neck and speak for Dave on this
one.
